rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 4 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 5:28 PM, 16 June 2025(Monday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Pampanga, Laguna and Quezon within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bataan(Bagac, Morong), Zambales(Santa Cruz, Candelaria), Batangas(Nasugbu), Cavite(Ternate, Bacoor, Imus, Kawit) and Metro Manila(Las Pinas) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
